body:
Radiance fans,

I thought some of you may be interested in this. HiPerWall just
recently displayed a 32k x 32k image that I made with Radiance. A
lower-resolution print was on display at SIGGRAPH 2006, and I
sent UC-Invine the full-resolution render about 6 months ago.

Mark
mstock@umich.edu
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Big Radiance rendering on HiPerWall
subject: [Radiance-general] Big Radiance rendering on HiPerWall
